title: Graham McNeil's work
body: Probably not going to get an official word on this but no harm in asking. I know that games companies work a fair bit ahead so I'm just wondering if we've seen any of Graham McNeil's work with the team yet, or (probably) was Burning Tides/Kindred etc all finished before he joined?

replies.body:
If I'm not wrong, Jaredan said a few days ago that Graham worked on Tahm and Kindred.

EDIT: Woops, apparently I was wrong. Thanks for correcting me, Melancholy Exile. :P
I'm not sure if anything has been released yet, but I do know he's hard at work on something and when you read it... you'll know >;)

> [{quoted}](name=Kindlejack,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=xEXY0tOW,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-10-14T07:11:34.738+0000)
>
> I'm not sure if anything has been released yet, but I do know he's hard at work on something and when you read it... you'll know >;)

Is it because it will be as filled with homoeroticism as his Warhammer 40,000 work is?

And I'm not knocking that.

Cause I want to read that.
so he's writing Taric's new lore, you say? I'm IN.
